org.araneaframework.uilib.form
Class Data<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.Data<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, FormElementAware<Object,T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigDecimalData, BooleanData, CharData, DateData, DisplayItemData, FileInfoData, IntegerData, JodaDateData, ListData, LongData, ObjectData, StringData, TimestampData
public class Data<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable, FormElementAware<Object,T>

This class represents typed form element data. Type is used by the ConverterFactory to find the appropriate Converter for converting Data held in FormElement to plain object type held in Control. Reverse converting happens much the same, both object type in Control and supposed FormElement Data are considered and appropriate Converter chosen.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

markBaseState

public void markBaseState()
Marks the current value of the Data as the base state that will be used to determine whether its state has changed in isStateChanged().

restoreBaseState

public void restoreBaseState()
Restores the value of the Data from the marked base state.

copyValue

protected T copyValue()
This method makes a copy of current value based on the type information. If the value is serializable, it is also copied, otherwise the same instance is returned.

Returns:
A copy of the value if this Data, or just the value as it currently is.
Since:
2.0

isStateChanged

public boolean isStateChanged()
Returns whether Data state (value) has changed after it was marked.

Returns:
whether Data state (value) has changed after it was marked.
